document_data.name: River Madras
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Madras''' was a small waterway found near the borders of [[Durpar]] and [[Var the Golden]] in the [[Shining Lands]].
document_data.Geography: The river flowed southeast from the [[Aerilpar Forest]] in [[Veldorn]] before joining the [[River Panka]] and heading due east to empty into the [[Golden Water]].
